thread.title: Guillem Balague delivers update on Arsenal and Liverpool bosses amid Barcelona link
thread.title_full: Guillem Balague delivers update on Arsenal and Liverpool bosses amid Barcelona link

title: Guillem Balague delivers update on Arsenal and Liverpool bosses amid Barcelona link
text:
Guillem Balague delivers update on Arsenal and Liverpool bosses amid Barcelona link GUILLEM BALAGUE believes Barcelona won't appoint Arsene Wenger or Jurgen Klopp as Luis Enrique's successor. PUBLISHED: 22:51, Mon, Feb 20, 2017 | UPDATED: 23:01, Mon, Feb 20, 2017 
Barcelona are looking for a new manager with Enrique expected to walk away at the end of the season. 
The Catalan giants have endured a difficult season and were thumped 4-0 by Paris Saint-Germain in the Champions League last week. 
They also trail Real Madrid by a point in La Liga, having played two games less. 
Klopp has been backed to take the reins at the Nou Camp despite Liverpool 's stuttering 2017 form. GETTY Luis Enrique looks set to leave Barcelona in the summer Premier League managers through the years: How the job takes its toll Tue, February 7, 2017 Express Sport takes a look at how the pressure of management has taken its toll on the current crop of Premier League bosses, with some handling it much better than others
